THAT GUY ALWAYS WAS A BIG MOUTH!
Morgan after killing the villager.

Morgan is a supporting antagonist and a boss of the 1993 arcade beat 'em up game Cadillacs and Dinosaurs.

Biography
Morgan is a short man with a hunchback armed with an Uzi. He is a member of the criminals leaded by Dr. Simon Fessenden and a volunteer for becoming a strongest creature. He and his men attacks a village with the brainwashed dinosaurs. A villager communicates him with the heroes about their village is under attack. Later, the heroes beat all thugs and encounter the villager. When the villagers talks, Morgan appears and kills him with his Uzi, right before engaging in fight with the heroes, where he is beaten. Then, Morgan gets up and grows mutating into a Pachycephalosaurus called Morgue. However, he is beaten again and finally dies.

Powers and Abilities
Morgan: In the battle, Morgan uses his Uzi, knives, stones and grenades to attack the player. He is very fast and dodges the attacks via running and jumping. Morgan can transform into the dinosaur called Morgue after being defeated.
Morgue: Morgue attacks with its head and claws. It is stronger than his human form, however, he is vulnerable to gun attacks.
